code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='https://api.yourdomain.com/payments/';const createPayment=async paymentData=>{const response=await axios.post(API_URL,paymentData,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('user')}`}});return response.data;};const getPaymentHistory=async()=>{const response=await axios.get(API_URL,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('user')}`}});return response.data;};const PaymentService={createPayment,getPaymentHistory};export default PaymentService;
